## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Polyethylene pellets or flakes. It has two different types (HDPE vs LDPE). 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Chemical|
|Form:|Solid|
